item.title: BlackBerry Music coder needed (San Francisco)
item.description:
We're seeking an experienced BlackBerry coder who's familiar with audio streaming formats and protocols and the available codecs on various BlackBerry devices (MP3/WMA/MMS/RTSP/AAC/etc).

Requirements:
* Mastery of the BlackBerry SDK
* Knowledge of music streaming protocols & formats
* Ability to work according to spec
* Ability to handle coding an entire app from top to bottom
* Ability to work independently

We are looking for someone to start ASAP and go from 0-60 instantly.

This is a contract position that may lead to a permanent position.
item.dc:title: BlackBerry Music coder needed (San Francisco)
